_A_TRANSLATION_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: ATranslation is a powerful and versatile Vue.js component that allows developers to seamlessly integrate translations into Vue.js applications. With a variety of supported features such as translating text, HTML content, and placeholders, ATranslation provides a robust solution for multilingual support in web applications. Supporting both mobile and desktop displays, as well as concatenation of Array data, this component offers a flexible and user-friendly localization solution.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_ARIA_LABEL_DESCRIPT: Demonstrates the use of aria-label for translating the text content of a button.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_EXTRA_DESCRIPTION_: Demonstrates the use of extra to replace placeholders in the translation. The translated text is displayed in the browser with the specified values.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_HTML_AFTER_BEFORE_D: The output shows the HTML content "_A_TRANSLATION_EXAMPLE_HTML_" with the additional text "$ " before and " â‚¬" after the HTML.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: The displayed HTML content "<button class='a_btn a_btn_primary' onclick='alert("Aloha")'>Aloha</button>" shows the button without the onclick attribute because DOMPurify.sanitize is used to prevent potential security risks from unsafe HTML.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_PLACEHOLDER_DESCRIP: This example demonstrates the use of the tag prop to create an input field in the component. The code shows how the placeholder text "_A_TRANSLATION_SHOW_MORE_" is displayed in the input field.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_PLACEHOLDER_HEADER_: Using tag and placeholder for an input field
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTI: The component allows using safe HTML content as a string. By enabling the safe-html prop and passing an HTML string, the provided HTML content is treated as trusted and inserted directly via the JavaScript attribute innerHTML.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_SLOT_DEFAULT_DESCRI: This example shows how the default slot is used in combination with text-before and text-after. In the browser, the text is displayed as + Aloha -.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_TEXT_AFTER_BEFORE_D: This demonstrates how additional text, such as " (Text After)", is displayed after and "(Text before) " before the translated main text to enhance text content flexibility.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_TEXT_AFTER_DESCRIPT: This demonstrates how additional text, such as " *(Aloha)", is displayed after the translated main text.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_TEXT_BEFORE_DESCRIP: This demonstrates how additional text, such as "$Aloha$ ", is displayed before the translated main text.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_TEXT_OBJECT_DESCRIP: This example illustrates the functionality of the text prop as an object. By using different texts for the mobile and desktop views, it shows how "_A_TRANSLATION_SHOW_MORE_" is displayed for mobile and "_A_TRANSLATION_SHOW_LESS_" for desktop.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_TITLE_ARRAY_DESCRIP: Demonstrates the use of an Array for title translation. The values are translated and concatenated with a space.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_TITLE_DESCRIPTION_: Demonstrates the use of title for translating a tooltip text.
_A_TRANSLATION_GROUP_TITLE_OBJECT_DESCRI: Demonstrates the use of title as an object for device-specific translations. The title text is not displayed if the screen width is smaller than the value defined in AMobilePlugin.
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_ALWAYS_TRANSLATE_DE: Forces translation regardless of the is-translate flag.
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_ARIA_LABEL_DESCRIPT: A translatable text for the ARIA labeling function. (Object -> mobile and desktop)
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: A translatable content that may contain HTML tags is sanitized and rendered. (Object -> mobile and desktop, Array -> Concatenation)
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_PLACEHOLDER_DESCRIP: A translatable placeholder text, e.g., for an input tag. (Object -> mobile and desktop)
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_SAFE_HTML_DESCRIPTI: Inserts the provided HTML content as is via innerHTML. (Object -> mobile and desktop, Array -> Concatenation)
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_TAG_DESCRIPTION_: The HTML tag used for the wrapping element. Default value: div.
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_TEXT_AFTER_DESCRIPT: A static text appended after the main content without being translated.
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_TEXT_BEFORE_DESCRIP: A static text prepended before the main content without being translated.
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_TEXT_DESCRIPTION_: A translatable text. (Object -> mobile and desktop, Array -> Concatenation)
_A_TRANSLATION_PROPS_TITLE_DESCRIPTION_: A translatable title text displayed as a tooltip. (Object -> mobile and desktop, Array -> Concatenation)
_A_TRANSLATION_SLOT_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION_: Default slot for the main content of the component.
